description.raw: This pull request merges two working examples (1D KdV Burgers, 2D Rayleigh-Benard) into the main repository.  The purpose is to create a (probably small) set of examples that are included and updated along with the source.  In choosing additional examples to include here, I think we should emphasize demonstrating different aspects of functionality rather than just adding different equations / systems.
